Class TreeEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • TreeEditor

  • class TreeEditor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for editing the left tree when EditActions are created. It edits the tree and creates popup texts

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CustomElement root
      The left tree

    • Constructor Summary

      Apply the UpdateTail action We don't add a popuptext for this option, as the new text contains and elements, which already ensure that this change is shown to the user
      (package private) void updateText(EditAction action)
      Apply the UpdateTextIn action We don't add a popuptext for this option, as the new text contains and elements, which already ensure that this change is shown to the user

      • updateTail

        void updateTail(EditAction action)
        Apply the UpdateTail action We don't add a popuptext for this option, as the new text contains and elements, which already ensure that this change is shown to the user

        action - The action

      • deleteNode

        java.util.ArrayList<EditAction> deleteNode(EditAction action)
        Apply the DeleteNode action
        Parameters:
        action - The action
        Returns:
        Contains all editactions of all children of the action on which this node is performed. We remove this list from the resulting list of edit actions, as children of a deleted node don't need any edit actions on them
